thread.title: Inventor and InventHelp Client Develops Storage Accessory for Boats (ATH-307)
thread.title_full: Inventor and InventHelp Client Develops Storage Accessory for Boats (ATH-307) - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Inventor and InventHelp Client Develops Storage Accessory for Boats (ATH-307)
text:
Founded in 1984 in Pittsburgh, InventHelp is submitting the BOAT SAVER to companies for their consideration and potential feedback.
PITTSBURGH, PA (PRWEB) October 12, 2015
"While I am not using my boat, it gets littered with pine cones, leaves and other debris, as well as soaked by snow, ice and rain," said an inventor from Covington, Ga. "I wanted a way to keep it protected during storage, which inspired me to develop this."
He developed the patent-pending BOAT SAVER to offer an efficient way to secure a tarp to a boat parked outdoors on a trailer. The accessory keeps the tarp lifted so that debris and moisture slide off the boat. This ensures that the boat remains clean and undamaged while not in use, which offers added peace of mind. It saves the owner from having to clean out the vessel interior prior to boating. Furthermore, the invention is designed to be lightweight, stable, user-friendly, reliable and practical.
The original design was submitted to the Atlanta office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-ATH-307, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
